header.title: DFE Frame Work - Inward Work Table

ovdesc.p: This is a inward work file LIVE table where the inward files will get split and updates as single file for each record to get processed in multi-thread routine.
The @ID will be start with interface id session id and number of the each line.
DFE Single threaded JOB DFE.INWARD.PRE.PROCESS will read the file and update this table.
DFE Multi-threaded Job DFE.INWARD.FILE.PROCESS will select with the respective ID and pass it to the build list.

desc.p: This field updated with each line of the inward file.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
